title: 'I'm Coming Back...' Brady Returns to Tampa
itunes:title: 'I'm Coming Back...' Brady Returns to Tampa
description:
Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu, and Mike Lynch discuss Tom Brady's 40-day retirement, Joe Buck's move to ESPN, and Naomi Osaka heckled during her loss at Indian Wells. All that and more on this Monday edition of Bloomberg Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
